ohu abibawanna ya, pragnyawanthaya ya. 61 : 02 wishwasa kala ayawaluni, numbaala nokarana daya pawasanne ayi? 61 : 03 numbaala nokarana daya pawasima allah hamuwe darunu kopayak gena dennaki. 61 : 04 allah sthira lesa ek karana lada godanagillak men pela gasi thama margayehi satan karana aya priya karayi. 61 : 05 “mage janathawani, ma numbaala wetha (ewana lada) allahge duthaya bawa dana gena ma numbaala mata pida karanne ayi da”yi musa thama janathawata ki sati sihi karanna.
